rules_text:
Haste, trample
Bloody Elemental attacks each combat if able.
When Bloody Elemental enters, if it isn’t a token, wound target creature. [i](Until the end of your next turn, if a wounded creature would be dealt damage, it’s dealt that much damage plus one instead.)[/i]
At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a token copy of Bloody Elemental for each creature you don’t control that’s wounded. Exile those tokens at the end of combat.
